title: User opens a News article
custom_preconds: Given the user has tapped on the News option from the main drop down
custom_steps: When the user taps on a news article in the index
custom_expected:
Then the news article corresponding to the article the user tapped on will open
And the Text resize/share icons should appear in the action bar
And the number of the article in the index along with the total number of articles in the index should appear in the action bar.

title: Image appears at top of article
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And there is an article that has an image associated with it.
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the News section
And the user selects an article
custom_expected: Then at the top of the article, the image should appear

title: News Index Loads
custom_preconds: Given the user has tapped on the News option from the main drop down
custom_steps: When the news index loads
custom_expected:
Then the list of articles will be clear, readable, and accurate
And will have correct images
and if an image is not available for the article, an MiLB place holder thumbnail will be there

title: User changes index orientation
custom_preconds:
Given the user has tapped on the News option from the main drop down
And the news index has loaded
custom_steps: When the user changes the orientation of the tablet
custom_expected:
Then the index will remain in list form
And will not display the 10-inch tablet layout (index on left, active article on right)

title: Newsreader updates
custom_preconds:
Publish in QA HomeBase. If issues occur on QA Homebase then may have to wait in PROD until a story is added
Triple A - http://www.milb.com/gen/2014/leagues/aaa/news_jsonv4.json
Double A - http://www.milb.com/gen/2014/leagues/aa/news_jsonv4.json
Class A Advanced - http://www.milb.com/gen/2014/leagues/advanced/news_jsonv4.json
Class A Full - http://www.milb.com/gen/2014/leagues/full/news_jsonv4.json
Class A Short - http://www.milb.com/gen/2014/leagues/short/news_jsonv4.json
Rookie - http://www.milb.com/gen/2014/leagues/rookie/news_jsonv4.json

Given the general MiLB news section is open
custom_steps:
When the app is backgrounded by the user for a period of time that it takes to change
and the app is reopened once that .json has changed
custom_expected: Then the app should immediately update according to the updated .json file and not show the news articles from before

title: User swipes between articles
custom_preconds: Given the user has tapped on the News option from the main drop down
custom_steps:
When the user notes the article headlines in the index
And opens the first article
custom_expected:
Then the user will be able to swipe to the left through all of the articles noted by the user above
And will be able to swipe right as far as the first article in the index
And if the user changes orientation they will still be able to perform this function

title: User swipes between articles for a team
custom_preconds: Given the user has tapped on the Team option from the main slide out menu and selects a Team
custom_steps:
When the user taps on News and notes the article headlines in the index
And opens the first article
custom_expected:
Then the user will be able to swipe to the left through all of the articles noted by the user above
And will be able to swipe right as far as the first article in the index
And if the user changes orientation they will still be able to perform this function

title: Article index number updates
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to a news article
And the user swipes from one article to another
custom_expected: Then the action bar should update to reflect the number of the article in the index along with the total number of articles in the index.

title: User taps text resize button
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the user has navigated to a News article
custom_steps: When the user taps the Text Resize button
custom_expected:
Then the text should get larger with each tap up to two times. 
And tapping the button when the text is at its largest size should update the text to the smallest size.

title: Token Support for News Articles_MIAN-635
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the user has navigated to a News article
custom_steps: When the user taps on non-text content listed below
custom_expected: Then the content is accessible

custom_steps_separated.content: HTML includes (including inset images, tables, etc.)

title: Sharing Icon
custom_preconds:
Given  the user has clicked on the News button from the main menu
And clicks on an article on the News Index
custom_steps: When the corresponding news article opens
custom_expected: Then the share icon will appear in the header next to the text resize icon

title: Tapping Sharing Icon
custom_preconds:
Given  the user has clicked on the News button from the main menu
 And clicks on an article in the News Index
And the corresponding news article opens
custom_steps: When the user taps the sharing icon
custom_expected: Then a menu appears with all of the device's native applications related to sharing

title: Tapping Twitter from Sharing menu
custom_preconds:
Given  the user has clicked on the News button from the main menu
And clicks on an article on the News Index
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the sharing button
AND we tap on the Twitter option in the sharing menu
custom_expected:
THEN a Tweet screen will appear with the article's URL
AND the Tweet screen will contain a Cancel button (or back button)
AND the Tweet screen will contain a Tweet button

title: Canceling out of Tweet screen
custom_preconds:
Given  the user has clicked on the News button from the main menu
And clicks on an article on the News Index
And the corresponding article opens
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the sharing button
AND we tap on the Twitter option in the sharing menu
AND we tap on the Cancel button
custom_expected: THEN the Tweet screen will successfully close.

title: Sharing to Twitter
custom_preconds:
Given  the user has clicked on the News button from the main menu
 And clicks on an article on the News Index
And the corresponding news article opens
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the sharing button
AND we tap on the Twitter option
AND we tap on the Tweet button
custom_expected: THEN the Tweet will successfully post to Twitter

title: Twitter Post
custom_preconds:
Given  the user has clicked on the News button from the main menu 
And clicks on an article on the News Index
And the corresponding new article opens
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the Sharing button
AND we tap on the Twitter option of the sharing menu
AND we tap on the Tweet button
AND we check Twitter
custom_expected: THEN we see that the Tweet contains the headline, the URL of the news article (responsive atmilb link)

title: Logging into Facebook
custom_preconds:
Given  the user has clicked on the News button from the main menu
And clicks on an article on the News Index
And the corresponding news article opens
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the Sharing button
AND we tap on a News Article
AND we tap on the Facebook button for the first time (user is not logged into Facebook)
custom_expected: THEN we will be brought to the Facebook application to log in

title: Canceling Facebook post
custom_preconds:
Given  the user has clicked on the News button from the main drop down
 And clicks on an article on the News Index
And the corresponding news article opens
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the sharing button
AND we tap on the Facebook button
AND we back out of the Facebook share dialog
custom_expected: THEN we can successfully cancel out of the subsequent Facebook screen

title: Posting to Facebook
custom_preconds:
Given  the user has clicked on the News button from the main drop down
 And clicks on an article on the News Index
And the corresponding news article opens
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the sharing button
AND we tap on the Facebook option in the sharing menu
AND we tap on the Share button
custom_expected: THEN the comment will successfully post to Facebook

title: Facebook Post
custom_preconds:
Given  the user has clicked on the News button from the main drop down
 And clicks on an article on the News Index
And the corresponding article opens
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the sharing button
AND we tap on the Facebook button
AND we tap on the Share button
custom_expected:
THEN on Facebook we will see a post including:
- the headline
- an appropriate thumbnail (team logo/player headshot)
- article's link, is responsive atmilb link
- and will see a short blurb of the article below the article's link

title: E-mail Application
custom_preconds:
Given  the user has clicked on the News button from the main drop down
 And clicks on an article on the News Index
And the corresponding news article opens
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the sharing button
AND we tap on the Email option from the sharing menu
custom_expected: THEN the native default e-mail application will open

title: No E-mail Account set
custom_preconds:
Given  we currently do not have an Email Account setup
And the user has clicked on the News button from the main drop down 
And clicks on an article on the News Index
And the corresponding news article opens
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the sharing button
AND we tap on the Email button
custom_expected:
THEN we will be prompted with a message of setting up our email account in Email Settings
And on version 4.1+ user must login to email to have the ability to share via email and not share via 'Gmail'

title: Sharing via E-mail
custom_preconds:
Given  the user has clicked on the News button from the main drop down 
And clicks on an article on the News Index
And the corresponding news article opens
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the sharing button
AND we tap on the Email option in the sharing menu
custom_expected: Then the e-mail will have the responsive atmilb link

title: Shared Email Content Received
custom_preconds:
Given  the user has clicked on the News button from the main drop down 
And clicks on an article on the News Index
And the corresponding news article opens
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the sharing button
AND we tap on the Email option in the sharing menu
AND we send the Email
custom_expected:
THEN we will see the Email successfully send
AND the recipient will successfully receive the Email

title: User can share article on device running OS 4.0+
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the user is using a handset with an OS of 4.0 or above
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the News section
And the user selects an article
And the user taps the "Share" button
custom_expected:
Then the list of share options should appear
And when the user selects an option, the article and pertinent info should populate in the selected medium.

title: After sharing on OS 4.0+, the most recent share action should appear next to the share icon.
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the device is running OS 4.0 or greater
custom_steps:
When the user shares an article via any medium
And the user returns to a news article
custom_expected: Then the medium the user used to share the article should appear as a quick option next to the share button.

title: Sharing via Multiple Social Mediums
custom_preconds:
Given  the user has clicked on the News button from the main drop down
 And taps on an article on the News Index
And the corresponding news article opens
OR
Given  the user has clicked on the Teams button from the main drop down
 And taps on a team
And taps on News
And selects any article from the team news index
And the corresponding news article opens
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the sharing button
AND

custom_steps_separated.content:
Tap on the Twitter option in the sharing menu,
tap on the Share button,
background the app
navigate to Twitter & verify post on Twitter's homepage
AND foreground the app
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the comment will successfully post to Twitter
AND app will not crash

custom_steps_separated.content:
Navigate to another news article
Tap on the Facebook option in the sharing menu,
tap on the Share button,
background the app
navigate to Facebook & verify post on Facebook's homepage
AND foreground the app
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the comment will successfully post to Facebook
AND app will not crash

custom_steps_separated.content:
Navigate to another news article
Tap on the native device's Email option in the sharing menu,
tap on the Share button,
background the app
verify user received e-mail
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the comment will successfully post to Facebook
AND app will not crash

title: Android - News MetaData_MIAN-177
custom_preconds:
We need consistency in the news article metadata format on the news landing page and article. I see this has been copied from At Bat which had a similar issue, but will just ask for First Pitch to be fixed.

For news landing page, would like the following:
First Last | Apr 3 | 10:00 AM ET

For article:
First Last | Source
April 3, 2014 | 10:00 AM ET

Please note
use of | not / 
The order of data
Not EDT, just ET
Abbreviate months to 3 letters only on landing page

title: News - Ad does not load after swiping 3 articles_MIAN-287
custom_preconds: This is configurable via AdMarvel, we have these turned OFF for now
custom_steps:
WHEN the user loads an article in MiLB First Pitch
AND swipes through the index
custom_expected: THEN after 3 articles, the user will be presented an advertisement

title: Support Token Functionality on News Articles_MIAN-326
custom_preconds: This is set up in QA by CMS.
custom_steps: Supported tokens:
custom_expected:
Supported tokens:

Player
Link
Video Embed
Include
(perhaps Instagram and Twitter)

title: Update Newsreader Output File_MIAN-229_need more info
custom_preconds:
From a CMS perspective it would make sense to have output set up similar to At Bat newsreader where the year is removed:

/gen/content/tag/v1/mlb/news/ipad_newsreader.json

Where we can update output based on version, club/leauge, platform, language.

title: DO NOT TEST_NOT VALID FOR ANDROID: Lite user swiping between articles reveals ads after every 3 articles
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the news section
And the user selects an article in the index
And the user swipes from one article to another
custom_expected:
Then after every 3rd article an ad should appear
And the action bar should update to show the word "Sponsor" instead of of the article number. 
And the Share icon/text resize buttons should disappear.
